dt: {bc}a device or piece used to create or maintain a desired amount of space (as between two parts)

dt.t: As long as your joints look even, it's more important that you avoid a large grout line at the last tile than worry about sticking to the exact measurement of the {wi}spacer{/wi}.
Stiff {wi}spacers{/wi} of low-expansion materials … may be used to provide a fixed spacing between the end mirrors.
Use wood shims or {wi}spacers{/wi} where necessary to compensate for wavy ceilings and to make certain the bottom surfaces of all strips are flush.

shortdef: a device or piece used to create or maintain a desired amount of space (as between two parts)
